title: Web 2.0-Based Distance Education Course for Enhancing Adult Collaborative Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool usage experience and intermediate-level expertise in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Implementing collaborative learning in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments repurposing existing school infrastructure, with continuous feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can solve specialized field tasks (medical/legal/technical) with 80% accuracy through real-time collaboration with peers in VR-based simulation environments
Learners can achieve 90% completion rates by creating asynchronous collaborative documents using Web 2.0 tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)
Learners can perform peer review and feedback routines three or more times on mobile-accessible platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
